channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Chevron stock is spiking after the U.S. raid on Venezuela
item.description: The price of U.S. crude oil gained 1% after U.S. forces captured Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro in a weekend raid.

item.title: If entry-level jobs disappear, who becomes a CEO?
item.description: As AI takes over early career work, companies are rethinking how leaders are made.

item.title: Ethereum has long talked a big game. Now it’s time for the second biggest blockchain to deliver
item.description: Cofounder Vitalik Buterin offers a bracing wake-up message for 2026.

item.title: While worker bonuses decrease, pay transparency is on the rise in 2026
item.description: Less than 40% of employees received a bonus last year, down from 44% in 2021, according to new data from ADP.

item.title: Crystal Ball: Will the AI bubble burst or balloon in 2026?
item.description: For the first installment of the Term Sheet 2026 Crystal Ball, we look at what readers say about one of the most pressing questions of our time: What ...
